fvs.taxe.controller

Class TopBarController

  • java.lang.Object
    • fvs.taxe.controller.TopBarController

  • public class TopBarController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller for the Top Bar of the GUI, changes the Top Bar.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int CONTROLS_HEIGHT
      The height of the Top Bar.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TopBarController(Context context)
      Instantiation method sets up a listener for Events starting to display the Event message in the Top Bar.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void displayFlashMessage(java.lang.String message, com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Color color)
      This method displays a message of a certain color in the Top Bar.
      void displayFlashMessage(java.lang.String message, com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Color backgroundColor, com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Color textColor, float time)
      This method displays a message of a certain color in the Top Bar for a certain amount of time while specifiying a background Color.
      void displayFlashMessage(java.lang.String message, com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Color color, float time)
      This method displays a message of a certain color in the Top Bar for a certain amount of time.
      void displayObstacleMessage(java.lang.String message, com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Color color)
      This method displays a message in the Top Bar with a specified background Color.
      void drawBackground()
      This method adds the background to the game.
      void drawEndTurnButton()
      This method adds an End Turn button to the game that captures an on click event and notifies the game when the turn is over.
      void drawFlashLabel()
      This method draws a label for a message
      void drawLabels()
      This method calls the label drawing methods
      void drawObstacleLabel()
      This method draws a label for obstacle messages

      • displayFlashMessage

        public void displayFlashMessage(java.lang.String message,
                       com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Color color,
                       float time)
        This method displays a message of a certain color in the Top Bar for a certain amount of time.
        Parameters:
        message - The message to be displayed.
        color - The color of the message to be displayed.
        time - The length of time to display the message, in seconds.

      • displayFlashMessage

        public void displayFlashMessage(java.lang.String message,
                       com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Color backgroundColor,
                       com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Color textColor,
                       float time)
        This method displays a message of a certain color in the Top Bar for a certain amount of time while specifiying a background Color.
        Parameters:
        message - The message to be displayed.
        backgroundColor - The color of the background to display behind the message.
        textColor - The color of the message to be displayed.
        time - The length of time to display the message, in seconds.

      • displayObstacleMessage

        public void displayObstacleMessage(java.lang.String message,
                          com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Color color)
        This method displays a message in the Top Bar with a specified background Color.
        Parameters:
        message - The message to be displayed.
        color - The background color to be displayed behind the message.

      • drawEndTurnButton

        public void drawEndTurnButton()
        This method adds an End Turn button to the game that captures an on click event and notifies the game when the turn is over.
